thread.title: Adele says ‘Hello’ & the world answers
thread.title_full: Adele says ‘Hello’ & the world answers | The Seattle Times

author: Paul de Barros
title: Adele says ‘Hello’ & the world answers
text:
Okay, it’s been four years since British soul songstress Adele released an album, but who knew the world was so hungry for the next one? The video for the first single, “Hello,” from forthcoming album “25” (due Nov. 20), has been viewed 3 million times on its first day of release and has raced to the top of the iTunes album chart in 77 countries, according to the album’s publicist. “Hello,” indeed.

Paul de Barros : 206-464-3247 or pdebarros@seattletimes ; on Twitter: @pdebarros . Paul de Barros is the popular music coordinator and critic for The Seattle Times. He assigns, edits and writes stories about popular music. He is the author of two award-winning books on jazz: “Jackson Street After Hours: The Roots of Jazz in Seattle” and “Shall We Play That One Together? The Life and Art of Jazz Piano Legend Marian McPartland.”
